question: In which nation "Basilica of Our Lady of Peace" is located?
explanation: Basilica of Our Lady of Peace is located in Yamoussoukro, Cote d'Ivoire. In terms of exterior area, it is the largest church in the world. But, it cannot be considered the largest church because its interior area is just 7989 sq.m. This church, affiliated to Roman Catholics, pays homage to St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican City. This church was consecrated by Pope John Paul II in 1990.
